channel.title: Projects on Life Reboot
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Life Reboot

item.title: Chrysalis - An Action RPG SDK
item.description: Chrysalis is a plugin for CRYENGINE 5.x, written in C++11, that provides a foundation of features required to create action RPG style games.

item.title: Dark Vale
item.description:
Travel into Dark Vale and take a look into madness.

Dark Vale is a project being developed by Transient Light Studio using CRYENGINE 5.x technology.
